projects.name: StudyAP
projects.tagline: Free AP exam prep platform serving 10K+ students
projects.description: Built a comprehensive platform providing free study materials, practice questions, and exam strategies for AP students. Grew organically to 10,000+ active users through word-of-mouth and community engagement.
highlights: Designed and implemented adaptive quiz engine with 2,000+ practice questions across 8 AP subjects
Built analytics dashboard showing student progress, weak areas, and study recommendations
Achieved 95+ Lighthouse scores across all metrics with optimized SSR and image delivery
Implemented real-time collaboration features for study groups using WebSockets
Created content management system for educators to contribute and review materials

projects.name: LightAid Lead
projects.tagline: Internal automation tools reducing manual work by 70%
projects.description: Developed suite of internal tools to automate repetitive workflows at LightAid, a nonprofit providing solar solutions to underserved communities. Focused on inventory management, donor tracking, and deployment logistics.
highlights: Built inventory management system tracking 5,000+ solar units across multiple warehouses
Automated donor reporting pipeline, reducing report generation time from 4 hours to 5 minutes
Created deployment planning tool optimizing logistics for 100+ installations per month
Integrated Slack notifications and alerts for critical inventory and deployment events
Implemented role-based access control and audit logging for compliance

projects.name: FRC Team 3256 Warriorborgs Robot Code
projects.tagline: Real-time robot performance analytics for competitive robotics
projects.description: Mobile-first scouting application for FIRST Robotics Competition teams to collect, analyze, and visualize robot performance data during competitions. Used by 50+ teams at regional and championship events.
highlights: Designed offline-first architecture with Firebase sync for reliable data collection in poor network conditions
Built statistical models predicting match outcomes with 78% accuracy using historical performance data
Created intuitive data entry interface reducing scout training time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Implemented real-time match strategy recommendations based on alliance partner analysis
Exported data visualizations and reports for strategy meetings and alliance selections

projects.name: DECA Event Scheduler
projects.tagline: Automated event scheduling system for chapter of 200+ members
projects.description: Built intelligent scheduling system for DECA business competitions, automatically generating conflict-free schedules for 500+ students across 40+ events while respecting room capacity, judge availability, and student preferences.
highlights: Implemented constraint satisfaction algorithm handling complex scheduling requirements
Reduced manual scheduling time from 20 hours to 2 minutes with automated conflict resolution
Built judge and room management interface with drag-and-drop schedule adjustments
Generated printable schedules, room assignments, and judge packets automatically
Added real-time notifications for schedule changes via email and SMS

projects.name: CLI Portfolio
projects.description: Modern take on the classic terminal portfolio, built with Next.js 15 and optimized for performance and accessibility. Features command history, tab autocomplete, and a hidden Easter egg.
highlights: Built custom CLI parser with command routing, argument validation, and error handling
Implemented keyboard-first UX with arrow key history and tab autocomplete
Achieved 95+ Lighthouse scores across all categories (Performance, Accessibility, SEO, Best Practices)
Added smooth animations and transitions using Framer Motion while maintaining 60fps
Fully responsive design adapting from mobile touch to desktop keyboard workflows

projects.name: Market Sentiment Analyzer
projects.tagline: ML-powered tool analyzing social media for market trends
projects.description: Experimental project analyzing social media sentiment to identify emerging market trends and consumer preferences. Built for learning NLP and time-series analysis techniques.
highlights: Implemented NLP pipeline processing 100K+ social media posts daily
Built sentiment classification model achieving 82% accuracy on validation set
Created interactive dashboard visualizing sentiment trends over time
Designed RESTful API serving real-time and historical sentiment data
Containerized application with Docker for easy deployment and scaling
